Features#

In order to create the plots in sportypy, each sport relies on a parameterized feature set. This is mainly intended for developers, but this reference may be helpful if youâ€™re looking to add a feature to your surface.

  • Baseball
  • Basketball
  • Curling
  • Football
  • Hockey
  • Soccer
  • Tennis
  • Volleyball
